channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio 2019 version 16.4 (includes 16.0 - 16.3)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio 2019 version 16.4 (includes 16.0 - 16.3)

item.title: CVE-2019-1352|2024-08-04T18:13:30.495Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio%202019%20version%2016.4%20%28includes%2016.0%20-%2016.3%29
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Git for Visual Studio improperly sanitizes input, aka 'Git for Visual Studio Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-1349, CVE-2019-1350, CVE-2019-1354, CVE-2019-1387.

item.title: CVE-2019-1350|2024-08-04T18:13:30.492Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio%202019%20version%2016.4%20%28includes%2016.0%20-%2016.3%29
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Git for Visual Studio improperly sanitizes input, aka 'Git for Visual Studio Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-1349, CVE-2019-1352, CVE-2019-1354, CVE-2019-1387.

item.title: CVE-2019-1354|2024-08-04T18:13:30.502Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio%202019%20version%2016.4%20%28includes%2016.0%20-%2016.3%29
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Git for Visual Studio improperly sanitizes input, aka 'Git for Visual Studio Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-1349, CVE-2019-1350, CVE-2019-1352, CVE-2019-1387.

item.title: CVE-2019-1486|2024-08-04T18:20:27.461Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio%202019%20version%2016.4%20%28includes%2016.0%20-%2016.3%29
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in Visual Studio Live Share when a guest connected to a Live Share session is redirected to an arbitrary URL specified by the session host, aka 'Visual Studio Live Share Spoofing Vulnerability'.
